subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: The United States men’s soccer team has played in six consecutive World Cups, but there are no guarantees in the Concacaf region as the final round of qualifying for 2014 is about to begin.
snippet: The United States men’s soccer team has played in six consecutive World Cups, but there are no guarantees in the Concacaf region as the final round of qualifying for 2014 is about to begin.
